panels.description: Quick glance of how many nodes are up and running

targets.expr: sum(max by(hostname) (up{exporter!="prometheus", luna_group=~"$luna_group", hostname=~"$hostname"}))/count(avg by(hostname) (up{exporter!="prometheus",luna_group=~"$luna_group", hostname=~"$hostname"}))

panels.title: Node Status

panels.description: List and statistics of detected filesystems
panels.title: Controller Filesystems

panels.description: Quick glance of alerts firing on the nodes
panels.title: Alerts

panels.description: Quick glance of the total resources on the nodes
panels.title: Resources

panels.description: Summary of all the nodes statisics

targets.expr: max by (hostname, luna_group) (ipmi_temperature_celsius{ name=~"[cC][pP][uU].*[tT][eE][mM][pP].*", luna_group=~"$luna_group", hostname=~"$hostname"})
max by (hostname, luna_group) (ipmi_temperature_celsius{ name=~"S[Yy][Ss].*[tT][eE][mM][pP].*", luna_group=~"$luna_group", hostname=~"$hostname"})

panels.title: Statistics
